## Matrix.FromXYZAxesToRef() method

Sets the given matrix as a rotation matrix composed from the 3 left handed axes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromXYZAxesToRef(xaxis: Vector3, yaxis: Vector3, zaxis: Vector3, result: Matrix): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  xaxis | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the value of the 1st axis |
|  yaxis | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the value of the 2nd axis |
|  zaxis | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the value of the 3rd axis |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the target matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
